title: Want Google Pixel 3A For Review
content:
Dear Sir / Madam
My name is Samyak Shah 
I have my own growing Youtube Channel named Samyak Shah 
I am also having 5K followers on Facebook and 7k followers on Instagram. 
I want Google Pixel 3a For Review. 
If you send me Google Pixel then I will make a review video and post it on Youtube, Facebook and Instagram which will surely Promote your product. 
If you send me Google Pixel + Google Home then I will send you screenshot of 10 people who have purchased Google Pixel Phones or Google Home. 
That much assurity I can provide you. 

Regards 
Samyak Shah
